December 1, 2016 <[[http://sdtimes.com/volkswagen-prepares-digital-transformation/]]> Volkswagen Prepares For Digital Transformation We're proud to be a strategic partner for Volkswagen through its digital transformation journey. Read More <[[http://sdtimes.com/volkswagen-prepares-digital-transformation/]]> <[[https://medium.com/built-to-adapt/deal-with-legacy-before-it-deals-with-you-cc907c800845#.179qwxz75]]> Deal with Legacy Before it Deals with You Helpful tactics from Coté on ensuring code hygiene and avoiding legacy problems caused by neglect. Check it Out <[[https://medium.com/built-to-adapt/deal-with-legacy-before-it-deals-with-you-cc907c800845#.179qwxz75]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/042-the-alignment-anti-pattern-improving-developer-skills]]> The Alignment Anti-Pattern, Improving Developer Skills Companies that want to get better at software are staffing and organizing themselves in new ways. In this episode, Coté and Richard look at a recent Cloud Foundry Foundation survey on developer skills and discuss some sections of Coté’s upcoming cloud-native journey booklet. Listen to the Episode <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-conversations/features/042-the-alignment-anti-pattern-improving-developer-skills]]> <[[https://youtu.be/ef-FqU6atak]]> BOSH—Twenty Years of Deployment Lessons in One Tool Or as Colin Humphreys likes to call it: "Twenty Years of the Incompetent Things That I've Done Really, Really Badly" Watch Now <[[https://youtu.be/ef-FqU6atak]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-insights/features/10-pivotal-dos-managed-services-for-greenplum-and-hdb-lets-enterprises-focus-on-analytics]]> Pivotal DOS Lets Enterprises Focus on Analytics Pivotal Data Operations Services, or Pivotal DOS, is a managed service offering for Pivotal Greenplum and Pivotal HDB, the leading Hadoop native SQL database for analytics. In this episode, host Jeff Kelly speaks with Jacque Istok, head of field engineering for Pivotal data, about the benefits of this new service to enterprises and best practices for getting started with MPP analytics. Listen to the Episode <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-insights/features/10-pivotal-dos-managed-services-for-greenplum-and-hdb-lets-enterprises-focus-on-analytics]]> <[[https://youtu.be/t7jziAWMhKk]]> Transforming the Monolith at 20M TPH Find out how Comcast went from large monolithic deployments with 90-day cycle times to a series of lean and agile teams with cycle times measured in hours.
